Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of Genetic Screening in Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis

Participants.evidence: This multicenter, prospective cohort study enrolled 1000 incident ALS patients from 22 ALS centers in France between April 2021 and April 2022. Participants met ALS diagnostic criteria

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the frequency of SOD1 variants and C9orf72 G4C2 repeats, assessed at baseline.

Number_Randomised.evidence: This multicenter, prospective cohort study enrolled 1000 incident ALS patients from 22 ALS centers in France between April 2021 and April 2022.

Result_Outcome.evidence: C9orf72 G4C2 repeats were found in 7.6% of patients, while SOD1 variants were present in 1.6%.
